CustomField.formula: IF(Organization__c != null, Organization__r.Name, IF(Assessment__c != null, Assessment__r.Organization_Name__c, IF(Grant__c != null, Grant__r.Organization_Name__c, IF(Reimbursement__c != null, Reimbursement__r.Organization__c, IF(Session_Report__c != null, Session_Report__r.Site_Name__c, '')))))
CustomField.label: Organization Name
